art.author: carol_j_johnson
art.post: Many years ago I had a vision of Christ. He was weeping over a possible loss of a soul. Satan was sneering at Christ. That person’s soul was not lost after all. Jesus no longer wept. The vision, which was huge in size, showed Christ to look almost exactly like this painting except for the tears were copious amounts..
art.title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud
